# NEO Rental Agent - AI/LLM Context File
# https://neohiorent.com
# Last updated: 2025-01-01

## Business Overview
NEO Rental Agent is a full-service property management company and licensed real estate brokerage based in Amherst, Ohio. Founded in 1998, we have been serving Northeast Ohio landlords and property investors for over 26 years.

## Company Information
- Name: NEO Rental Agent
- Founded: 1998
- Location: 1927 Cooper Foster Park Rd, Amherst, OH 44001
- Phone: (440) 240-8406
- Hours: Monday-Friday 9am-5pm
- Website: https://neohiorent.com

## Team
- Kim Strader - Realtor & Property Manager (Kstrader@neorentalagent.com)
- Mike Allen - Property Manager (Mallen@neorentalagent.com)

## Services Offered

### Property Management
- Tenant screening (credit checks, background checks, income verification, rental history)
- Marketing and tenant placement
- Rent collection and enforcement
- 24/7 maintenance coordination
- Legal compliance and eviction handling
- Monthly financial statements and tax-ready reporting

### Real Estate Brokerage
- Investment property acquisition assistance
- Market analysis for rental properties
- Property sales for investors
- Full transaction support from search to closing

## Service Area
We serve five counties in Northeast Ohio:

### Lorain County (Primary)
Amherst, Lorain, Elyria, Avon, Avon Lake, North Ridgeville, Oberlin, Vermilion, Wellington, Sheffield Lake, Grafton

### Cuyahoga County
Cleveland, Lakewood, Parma, Westlake, Rocky River, Bay Village, North Olmsted, Strongsville

### Erie County
Sandusky, Huron

### Summit County
Akron

### Medina County
Medina, Brunswick

## Key Differentiators
1. Licensed brokerage with real estate agents on staff - buy, sell, and manage under one roof
2. 26 years of local Northeast Ohio experience
3. Not a national chain - locally owned and operated
4. Full investor lifecycle support from acquisition to sale
5. One relationship, one team - no referrals or handoffs

## Ideal Clients
- First-time rental property investors
- Landlords with 1-50+ rental properties
- Out-of-state investors needing local management
- Investors looking to buy, sell, or scale their portfolios

For a free portfolio consultation with no obligation:
- Call: (440) 240-8406
- Email: Kstrader@neorentalagent.com
- Visit: https://neohiorent.com/contact.html
